data.chText: 肖像；半身画像；半身照
data.enText: a painting, drawing or photograph of a person, especially of the head and shoulders

data.chText: 他让人画了一幅身着制服的画像。
data.enText: He had his portrait painted in uniform.

data.chText: 全身画像
data.enText: a full-length portrait

data.chText: 肖像画家
data.enText: a portrait painter

data.chText: 详细的描述；描绘
data.enText: a detailed description of sb/sth

data.chText: 对法国宫廷生活的详细描述
data.enText: a portrait of life at the French court

data.chText: 竖向的；纵向打印格式的

before.enText: of a page of a document

data.enText: printed so that the top of the page is one of the shorter sides

data.text: photograph ♦ photo ♦ picture ♦ shot ♦ snapshot/snap ♦ portrait

data.chText: 以上各词均指照片、相片。
data.enText: These are all words for a picture that has been made using a camera.
photograph

data.chText: 指照片、相片：
data.enText: any picture that has been made using a camera

data.chText: 这座房子的照片
data.enText: a photograph of the house

data.chText: 我可以拍个照吗？
data.enText: Can I take a photograph ?
photo

data.chText: 为photograph的缩略形式：
data.enText: short form of photograph

data.chText: 护照相片
data.enText: passport photo

data.chText: 我们拍了一些这个城市的照片。
data.enText: We took some photos of the city.

data.chText: 用photo还是photograph？
以上两词意思和用法均相同，只是photo较非正式，较常用于口语中。
data.enText: These two words have the same meaning and are used in the same way, but photo is more informal and more common in spoken language.
photo or photograph?
picture

data.chText: 指照片、相片：
data.enText: a photograph

data.chText: 我们在旅馆前照了相。
data.enText: We had our picture taken in front of the hotel.

data.chText: 如果不会与其他形式的图片，如图画、绘画混淆，picture只指照片。
data.enText: Picture is generally only used with this meaning if it cannot be confused with another type of picture, for example a drawing or painting.
shot

data.chText: 指照片，该词重点强调拍摄照片的过程，而非已拍出的照片：
data.enText: a photograph; this word focuses more on the process of producing the photograph, rather than the finished item

data.chText: 我试着给他拍一张在水中的照片。
data.enText: I tried to get a shot of him in the water.
snapshot/snap

data.chText: 指由非专业摄影师抢拍的照片：
data.enText: an informal photograph that is taken quickly, and not by a professional photographer

data.chText: 度假时拍的照片
data.enText: holiday snaps
portrait

data.chText: 指肖像、半身画像、半身照此类照片，通常由专业摄影师拍摄。
data.enText: a painting, drawing or photograph of a person, especially of the head and shoulders. A portrait photograph is usually done by a professional photographer in a formal way.

data.text: picture ♦ drawing ♦ painting ♦ portrait ♦ illustration ♦ sketch ♦ image

data.chText: 以上各词均表示图画、绘画。
data.enText: These are all words for a scene, person or thing that has been represented on paper by drawing, painting, etc.
picture

data.chText: 指用铅笔、钢笔或颜料画出的图画、绘画：
data.enText: a scene, person or thing that has been represented on paper using a pencil, a pen or paint

data.chText: 孩子在画他们的宠物。
data.enText: The children were drawing pictures of their pets.
drawing

data.chText: 指用铅笔或钢笔而非颜料画出的图画、素描画：
data.enText: a picture that has been made using a pencil or pen, not paint

data.chText: 铅笔／木炭画
data.enText: a pencil/charcoal drawing
painting

data.chText: 指用颜料画出的图画、绘画：
data.enText: a picture that has been made using paint

data.chText: 美国艺术家的绘画作品集
data.enText: a collection of paintings by American artists
portrait

data.chText: 指肖像、半身画像、半身照：
data.enText: a painting, drawing or photograph of a person, especially of the head and shoulders

data.chText: 弗美尔的“艺术家在画室的肖像”
data.enText: Vermeer's ‘Portrait of the artist in his studio’

data.chText: 自画像
data.enText: a self-portrait (= a painting that you do of yourself)
illustration

data.chText: 指书或杂志中的插图、图表：
data.enText: a picture in a book or magazine, especially one that shows or explains sth

data.chText: 见166页上的插图。
data.enText: See illustration on p.166.
sketch

data.chText: 指素描、速写、草图：
data.enText: a simple picture that is drawn quickly and does not have many details

data.chText: 我开始作画之前通常要画几幅草图。
data.enText: I usually do a few very rough sketches before I start on a painting.
image

data.chText: 指画像、雕像、塑像：
data.enText: a copy of sb/sth in the form of a picture or statue

data.chText: 洞穴壁上装饰着鹿和猎人的画像。
data.enText: Images of deer and hunters decorate the cave walls.

data.chText: 用picture还是image？
image可指雕像、塑像；picture总是指平面图画。picture可指风景画；image总是指人或事物的画像、雕像。image较正式，较不常用。
data.enText: An image can be a statue; a picture is always two-dimensional (= flat) . A picture can show a scene; an image is always of a person or thing. Image is more formal and much less frequent.
picture or image?

tr: any likeness of a person, in any medium
a word picture of a person's appearance and character

value.def: A portrait is a painting, drawing, or photograph of a particular person.

example.ex: Lucian Freud has been asked to paint a portrait of the Queen.
example.tran: 卢西恩·弗洛伊德已受邀为女王画肖像画。
英格兰肖像画家奥古斯塔斯·约翰

value.def: A portrait of a person, place, or thing is a verbal description of them.

example.ex: ...this gripping, funny portrait of Jewish life in 1950s London.
example.tran: 这段扣人心弦、令人捧腹的对伦敦20世纪50年代犹太人生活的描写

trans: 相图；相位影像；相平面图；相位图
全家福；家庭肖像；四十不惑；全家福照片
